summary: Email correspondence between federal prosecutors and Dr. Dawn Hughes regarding her potential expert testimony in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The emails discuss scheduling a call and provide contact information for attorney Roberta Kaplan.

persons.name: Dawn Hughes
persons.role: Clinical and Forensic Psychologist, potential expert witness
persons.context: Contacted by federal prosecutors to discuss testifying as an expert witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. She provides her CV and engagement agreement.

persons.name: Roberta Kaplan
persons.role: Attorney at Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP
persons.context: Her contact information is provided by Dr. Hughes, suggesting she may be involved in coordinating or representing Dr. Hughes's engagement.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the federal criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which expert testimony is being sought.

connections.description: Dr. Hughes is being contacted by federal prosecutors to potentially testify as an expert witness in the trial against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Dr. Hughes provides Roberta Kaplan's contact information, indicating a professional connection, possibly for legal representation or coordination.

events.title: Email exchange regarding expert testimony
events.description: Follow-up email thanking Dr. Hughes for a conversation earlier in the day about her potential expert testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Scheduling call with Dr. Hughes
events.description: Email exchange scheduling a call for Wednesday at 2 p.m. to discuss Dr. Hughes's availability to testify as an expert witness.

events.title: Initial contact from prosecutors
events.description: Federal prosecutors reach out to Dr. Dawn Hughes to discuss her availability to testify as an expert witness in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Scheduled trial date for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin in the Southern District of New York.

locations: New York, New York 10118 (Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP address: 350 Fifth Avenue, Suite 7110)
keyFacts: Federal prosecutors are seeking Dr. Dawn Hughes as an expert witness for the trial of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The trial is scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021, in the Southern District of New York.
Dr. Hughes is a board-certified forensic psychologist and clinical assistant professor at Weill Cornell Medical Center.
Attorney Roberta Kaplan's contact information is provided, indicating potential legal coordination.
The correspondence shows the prosecution's preparation phase for the Maxwell trial in late 2020.
